55ad09c9024d2f0d23123c934e505042516cc796.commitMessage: Move python properties to decorator syntax

subchanges.commitMessage: Move python properties to decorator syntax
subchanges.actualSource:
@property
    def templates_auto_reload(self):
        """Reload templates when they are changed. Used by
        :meth:`create_jinja_environment`.

        This attribute can be configured with :data:`TEMPLATES_AUTO_RELOAD`. If
        not set, it will be enabled in debug mode.

        .. versionadded:: 1.0
            This property was added but the underlying config and behavior
            already existed.
        """
        rv = self.config["TEMPLATES_AUTO_RELOAD"]
        return rv if rv is not None else self.debug

         .. versionadded:: 1.0
             This property was added but the underlying config and behavior
             already existed.
         """
         rv = self.config["TEMPLATES_AUTO_RELOAD"]
         return rv if rv is not None else self.debug

4fc48200a58907ffdf136961b84ef7d19192e6ef.actualSource:
def _get_templates_auto_reload(self):
        """Reload templates when they are changed. Used by
        :meth:`create_jinja_environment`.

        This attribute can be configured with :data:`TEMPLATES_AUTO_RELOAD`. If
        not set, it will be enabled in debug mode.

        .. versionadded:: 1.0
            This property was added but the underlying config and behavior
            already existed.
        """
        rv = self.config['TEMPLATES_AUTO_RELOAD']
        return rv if rv is not None else self.debug
